p.s: prathamaṃ prabandhamukhalakṣaṇeritāṃ paradevatāsmaraṇamaṅgalādikāṃ rasikān prati prakaraṇakriyonmukhaḥ kavirāṭ karoti bhavabhūtirāśiṣaṃ — sānandam ityādi |
āhūtaḥ snigdhagambhīramuravaravaśravaṇānantaram eva jaladabṛṃhitaśaṅkayā saharṣaṃ samāgatatvādākārita ivetyutprekṣā |
pratidiśaṃ kriyate kaḷabhai ravaḥ, balākrāntaṃ krīḍaddviradamathitorvīruharavaiḥ iti ca māghakāvye | ṇamaha a jassa phuḍaravaṃ, ṇiaaravāhi phuḍaṇintajasaṇighghosaṃ iti ca setau |
lakṣaṇataḥ prayogasya balīyastvāc ca | ata eva hi tathāmnātam api kavibhir anādṛtam ity aprayuktasya duṣṭatvābhidhānam |
barhī mayūraḥ, tasmād yas trāsaḥ, tato hetoḥ |

bhogo rājye dhane saukhye pālanābhyavahārayoḥ |
phaṇe dehe ca sarpasya veśyādīnāṃ bhṛtāvapi ||

evaṃ vaināyakyaḥ, bhaktajanavighnavinayanād vināyako gaṇapatiḥ, tatsambandhinyaḥ |

atra vṛddhirādaic 1-1-1 itivat sānandam iti maṅgalaśabdopakramānnandinaḥ parameśvaramūrtibhedasya tadāhatamuravoktisāmarthyāgūritanaṭanāṭyākṣiptasya parameśvarasya kaumāreti prastutasya kumārasya prādhānyena padyapratipādyasya vināyakasya cānusandhānāt sahṛdayānuddiśya cāśīrvacanādabhimatārthasiddhaye mahākavinā paramaṃ maṅgalaṃ prayuktamiti veditavyam |
na ca mantavyaṃ nāsāgrarandhrapraveśaprasaṅgato bhujaṅgapateramaṅgalabhūtaṃ mataṅgajamukhasya kimapi vyasanamādau kavinā sūcitam iti |
tatprasaṅgopādhinā bhagavato vināyakasya lokottareṇa rūpeṇa varṇitatvāttatraiva ca tātparyāt |
lakṣayojanonnateramarorvībhṛtaḥ śarvadhanuṣo maurvīpadamanubhūya garvitasya darvīkarapateḥ praveśāya pātālagahvaramiva puṣkaravivaraṃ tāvat puṣkalam |
vadanavidhutigrahaṇena yasya kasyāpi paradevatāvyāpārasya bhaktaparirakṣaṇasāmarthyaṃ prakāśyate |
atra sānandam iti śailādeḥ śivaviṣayo bhāvo dhvanyate |
gaṇḍoḍḍīnetyādibhirakāṇḍakopatāṇḍavitena jagadaṇḍamapi khaṇḍayituṃ paṇḍitasya praṇatajanaparitrāṇe kiyān prayāsa iti vastusāmarthyātiśayayogāt devatāntarebhyo vyatireka iti vyatirekālaṅkāraś ca |
tataś ca trividhadhvanivyāptiṃ svaprabandhasya gandhayati kaviḥ |
pāntu vaḥ iti kaver devatāviṣayo bhāvaḥ prakāśyate |

choice.orig: nāndyante sūtradhāraḥ
choice.reg: nāndī-ante sūtradhāraḥ

p.s: pratyūhanirasanaucityādvināyakamukhenāśiṣaṃ prayujyādhunā sūtradhāradvārā svābhimataparadevatāmukhena tribhiḥ padyairāśiṣaṃ prayuṅkte kaviḥ — nāndyante sūtradhāraḥ cūḍāpīḍetyādi |
nāndī nāma pūrvaraṅgavidhāne pratyāhārādiprarocanāntadvāviṃśatyaṅgataraṅgite yavanikāntargatena sūtradhāreṇa maṅgalārthaṃ kartavyaḥ prayogaviśeṣaḥ |

yathoktaṃ kohalena—
devatādinamaskāramaṅgalārambhapāṭhanam |
nāṭyādau śasyate yattu sā nāndī kathitā budhaiḥ ||
iti |
nāndīśabdaśca bhaṭṭaghasyunā ṇadi stutau ityasmāt pṛṣodarāditvāt sādhitaḥ |

tathā bādarāyaṇaḥ
yadyapyaṅgāni bhūyāṃsi pūrvaraṅgasya nāṭake |
tathāpyavaśyakartavyā nāndī vighnapraśāntaye ||
iti |

tathāha bharataḥ
yasmādutthāpayantyādau prayogaṃ nāndipāṭhakāḥ |
tasmādutthāpanaṃ jñeyaṃ vāgaṅgavyaktikārakam ||
yasmācca lokapālānāṃ parivṛtya caturdiśam |
vandanāṃ saṃprakurvanti tasmāt syāt parivartanam ||
āśīrvacanasaṃyuktā yasmānnityaṃ bhavediha |
devadvijanṛpādīnāṃ tasmānnāndīti śabdyate ||
siddhenāmantraṇaṃ yā tu vijñeyā sā prarocanā |
siddhastrivikrame viṣṇuḥ siddhaḥ krauñcapade guhaḥ ||
ityādi |
tādṛśyā nāndyā ante avasāne nāndīsūtradhāre niṣkrānte sati sthāpakasūtradhāraḥ praviśyāhetyarthaḥ |

yathoktaṃ bharatena—
prayujya raṅgaṃ niṣkrāmet sūtradhāraḥ sahānugaḥ |
sthāpakaḥ praviśettatra sūtradhārasamākṛtiḥ ||
iti |

nāndī ca dvividhā—
pūrvaraṅge prayojyaikā sthāpanāyāmathāparā |
sā cāvaśyaṃ candranāmāṅkitā prayoktavyeti kavisampradāyaḥ |

yathāha bharataḥ—

iti |

cūḍā keśī keśapāśī śikhaṇḍī kamujā śikhā |
iti vaijayantī |
prāyo vayasi bāhulye tulyānaśanamṛtyuṣu iti vaijayantī |
kapilatayā prabhābāhulyena ca vidyutprāyāstaṭittulyāḥ nayanodaraprabhāmilitāśca dyutayo yāsām |
bhujaṅgavallī latāvad drāghīyān sarpaḥ, tasya valayaṃ vartulīkṛtaḥ śarīrasanniveśaḥ, tadeva srak mālā tayā naddho baddho jūṭaḥ samūho yāsām |

tvāmityanenaucityāt
sabhāpatiḥ sambodhyate, vaḥ ityanena yathā sāmājikāḥ |
atra ca galadvārividyududyotaketakodbhedavallīvalayapratipādanājjaladasamayavirājinīnāṃ vanarājīnāṃ pratibhānena jaṭānāṃ tābhirupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyaḥ |
tataś ca yathā tādṛśyo vanarājayaḥ sakalajantusantāpahāriṇyastathā tathāvidhāḥ parameśvarasya jaṭā apītyupamālaṅkāreṇa vyaṅgyena dyotyate |

choice.reg: gaṇḍa-granthi-abhighāta-jarjara-śikhāḥ cūḍā-sravantī-ūrmayaḥ śambhoḥ brahma-kapāla-kandara-bhuvi spanda-ulbaṇāḥ pāntu vaḥ || 3 ||

p.s: ghrāṇanetraśrotravivareṣu tiryakpravartaneṣu, udgatabudbudaṃ yathā tathā dhvananaśīlāḥ |
atītānāṃ bahūnāṃ caturmukhānāṃ śiraḥkapālānyeva kandarā giriguhāḥ, tadvat gambhīratvāt |

choice.reg: pakṣma-ālī-piṅgalimraḥ kaṇaḥ iva taṭitām yasya kṛtsnaḥ samūhaḥ yasmin brahma-aṇḍam īṣad-vighaṭita-mukule kālayajvā juhoti |

choice.reg: arcir-niṣṭapta-cūḍā-śaśi-galita-sudhā-sāra-sātkāri-koṇam tārtīyīkam purāreḥ tat avatu madana-ploṣaṇam locanam vaḥ || 4 ||

kṛtsno bhūto bhavan bhāvī ca sarvaḥ samuditaḥ |

atra kāryabhūtasya kṛtsnataṭitsamūhakaṇībhāvasyāprastutasya sambhāvanena kāraṇabhūtaḥ pakṣmālīpiṅgalimno bāhulyadurnnirīkṣaprabhatvādiratiśayaḥ prastuto gamyate iti kāryāt kāraṇapratītirūpeyamaprastutapraśaṃsā |

sūryāṇḍagoḷayormadhye koṭyaḥ syuḥ pañcaviṃśatiḥ |
iti bhāgavatokteḥ |
īṣadvighaṭitamukuḷe mukulaśabdaḥ sādṛśyānnimīlanaṃ lakṣayati, kiñcidviśliṣṭapakṣmabandha ityarthaḥ |

tathoktam ambāstave—
dagdhaṃ yadā madanamekamanekadhā te mugdhaḥ kaṭākṣavidhiraṅkurayāṃcakāra |
dhatte tadāprabhṛti devi! lalāṭanetraṃ satyaṃ hriyeva mukulīkṛtamindumauliḥ ||
iti |

kālayajvā
sthānātsthānaṃ daśaguṇamekasmāt gaṇyate dvija |
tato'ṣṭādaśa(me ? ke) bhāge parārdhamabhidhīyate ||
ity uktaparārdhadvayarūpasya brahmāyuṣaḥ parasaṃjñasyāvasānakāla ityarthāt |
vartamānanirdeśādanādisiddhe saṃsāre pralayodayayorapi cakravat parivṛtteḥ pratiparāvasānaṃ homo vyajyate |

prakṛterguṇasāmyasya nirviśeṣasya mānavi |
ceṣṭā yataḥ sa bhagavān kāla ityupalakṣitaḥ ||
iti bhāgavatokteḥ |

tathāvidhānāmabdānāṃ śataṃ tvamapi jīvasi |
tvadāyurmama niśvāsaḥ kālenaiva pracodyate ||
iti śrībhagavatpādācāryavacanāc ca |

yathāha murāriḥ—
nīlalohitalalāṭalāñchane locane jayati ko ’pi pāvakaḥ |
rakṣitasya jagadantahetave yasya saṃjvalanam ātmabhūr abhūt ||
iti |
kālasya yajvatvena rūpaṇāllocanasyāgnikuṇḍatvaṃ jagadaṇḍasya havyatvaṃ cārthasiddhamityekadeśavivartirūpakam |
sātkāro nāma jalabindupātanirvāpyamāṇadahanaśabdānukāraḥ tadvān sātkārī apāṅgadeśo yasya |
tīyādīkak svārthe vā vaktavyam vā. 4-2-8 itīkak |
pluṣa dāhe ityasmāt kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam 3-3-113 iti kartari lyuṭ |

atra cāyamakhilopaniṣadaṅganāsaṅgītaraṅgamaṇḍapena sāṅkhyayoga
sāgarapārāvārīṇena kavikulendunā gurumukhaikagamyo'tirahasyo'rthaḥ sūtrito'nusandheyaḥ |
pakṣma sūtrādyavayave kiñjalke netraromasu iti vaijayantī |
atra ca vālāgravat nīvāraśūkavacca tanīyasī, trapusītantuvacca pītavarṇā prabhāsantatiḥ sādṛśyāt pakṣmālītyucyate |

śāstreṇa naśyet paramārtharūpaṃ kāryakṣamaṃ naśyati cāparokṣyāt |
prārabdhanāśāt pratibhāsanāśa evaṃ kramān naśyati cātmamāyā ||
ity ācāryavacanāt |
kālayajvā niyatakālānatikrameṇa śrutismṛtivihitaiḥ karmabhirīśvaraṃ pūjayan puruṣaḥ |

yathāhur ācāryāḥ—
saṅkalpya havyaṃ sakalaprapañcaṃ prajñāsrucā sarvahutaṃ vimuktyai |
jājvalyamāne svata eva nitye sarvāntare jyotiṣi johavīmi ||
iti |

ambāstave ca—
brahmāṇḍabudbudakadambakasaṅkulo ’yaṃ māyodadhirvividhatatvataraṅgamālaḥ |
āścaryamamba jhaṭiti pralayaṃ prayāti tvaddhyānasantatimahābaḍavāmukhāgnau ||
iti |

tārtīyīkam—
anyadeva tadviditādatho aviditādadhi |
ity upaniṣannītyā māyātatkāryavyatiriktaṃ tadadhyāsādhiṣṭhānatayā tṛtīyam |

yadvā—
śaivāgameṣu mukhyaṃ patipaśupāśā iti kramāt tritayam |
ity uktakrameṇa niyāmyayoḥ paśupāśayorniyantṛtvena taduttīrṇaṃ purāreḥpuraṃ śarīraṃ bhaktānāmajñānanidānakarmamithunanirmitadehabandhanirmūlanasya madanaploṣaṇaṃ saṃsāraviṣatarubījabhūtamanmathonmathanam |

kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ |
mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhyenamiha vairiṇam ||
iti bhagavadvacanāt |

yathāhur ācāryāḥ—
mūlādhārāt sphuritataṭidāmāprabhāsūkṣmarūpo gacchantyāmastakamaṇutarā tejasāṃ mūlabhūtā |
sauṣumnādhvācaraṇanipuṇā sā savitrānubaddhā dhyātā sadyo'mṛtamatha raveḥ srāvayet sārdhasomāt ||
iti |
atra ca jaṭānāṃ dharmaliṅgatvāddharmavṛddhisravantyūrmīṇāṃ duritaharatvādadharmanirāso locanasya jñānasvarūpatvāttatsādhyo mokṣaścāśāsita iti kramo mantavyaḥ ||
